Job PurposeProduce detailed financial models and investment write-ups, conduct necessary industry and business research analysis complying with Al-Tijaria’s strategy and objectives.Disclaimer: The job holder has to comply with and follow the established policies and procedures of Al-Tijaria.إعداد نماذج مالية مفصلة والإكتتابات الاستثمارية ، وإجراء التحليلات اللازمة و البحث في قطاع الصناعة والأعمال بما يتوافق مع استراتيجية وأهداف الشركة التجارية العقارية.إخلاء المسؤولية: يجب على صاحب العمل الامتثال واتباع السياسات والإجراءات المعمول بها في التجاري.Key Accountabilities & Performance IndicatorsAccountabilitiesASSET MANAGEMENT Evaluate investment opportunities proposed either internally or externally
Gather information and data from different public and private sources, by conducting relevant market surveys or third party sources.
Analyze and evaluate gathered information
Prepare report on market research findings and analysis
Prepare full due diligence covering at macro, micro and operational levels for proposed investment opportunity prepare final recommendation.
Investment Portfolio Management 
Gather information and data from different sources on Al Tijaria / Subsidiaries’ owned securities.
Evaluating Al Tijaria investments.
Calculate actual and expected returns, overall portfolio returns and risks supported by variance analysis on the portfolio, prepare report on findings and analysis for Board review.
Analyze feedback of the Board on the strategic direction of Al Tijaria.
Prepare list of requisites for clarification on performance concerns for discussion with board representatives prior to and after board meetings.
Gather information on underperforming investments not befitting Al Tijaria’s long term strategy.
Analyze and evaluate exit strategies suggested by the management.
Follow up and update comprehensive report on regular basis.
